Bertin gets his agricultural inputs in a town in Benin. In order to increase his production and his level of business, he is requesting a 5th loan from ALIDé. This loan will enable him to better respond to his customer demand and to make more profits. The previous loans have been properly repaid.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs for growing corn, black-eyed peas and peppers.

loans.name: Sébatien

texts.fr: Sébastien, est âgé de 52 ans et est mariée à Séverine, une marchande. Le couple a neuf enfants, dont certains scolarisés et tous à leur charge. La famille vit ensemble. Sébastien assure ensemble avec sa femme les diverses charges familiales. Sébastien n’a pas fréquenté l'école. Pour subvenir à ses différents besoins, Sébastien fait l'élevage des porcs depuis une trentaine d’années. Parallèlement à cette activité, Sébastien cultive du maïs, du niébé et du gombo. Sébastien s’approvisionne en intrants dans une ville du Bénin. En vue de renforcer davantage son activité par l’augmentation du stock de ses produits et d'accroître sa culture, Sébastien sollicite pour la sixième fois l'appui financier de ALIDé. Son point fort en tant qu’entrepreneur est le bon accueil réservé à sa clientèle. Les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Sébastien is 52 years old and is married to Séverine, a trader. The couple have 9 dependent children, some of whom go to school. The family live together. Sébastien takes care of the family's various expenses together with his wife. Sébastien did not go to school. In order to meet his various needs, he has been breeding pigs for around 30 years. He also grows corn, black-eyed peas and okra.

Sébastien gets his agricultural inputs in a town in Benin. He is requesting financial support from ALIDé for the 6th time, in order to further strengthen his business by increasing his stock of products and his production. His strength as an entrepreneur is the warm welcome he reserves for his customers. The previous loans have been properly repaid.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs for growing corn, black-eyed peas and okra.

loans.name: Kahramon

texts.ru: Кахрамон трудолюбивый и добропорядочный мужчина, он женат. Дети несовершеннолетние. Условия жизни у них были очень тяжелые. Самых ранних лет он работал на поле, как все сельские жители он  пас скот. Повзрослев, он женился, и опять занимался животноводством и работал на поле. В основном он  выращивает пшеницу, кукурузу и другие сельхозпродукты. Уже более 15 лет он занимается этим бизнесом. Жена и сыновья помогают ему в ведении бизнеса. Полученный урожай он  продает местным жителям по более низкой цене, чем на базаре, с первых рук. Кахрамон пшеницу переработает на мельнице и из этой муки выпекают хлеб. Остатки от переработки использует для откорма скота. Кахрамон хочет улучшить благосостояние семьи, а для этого ему не обходимо купить некоторые техники и современную мебель, так как у них мебель старая и сломанная. Его доход не позволяет ему купить мебель и поэтому он запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 сомони для покупки мебели. Это мебель создаст уют в его доме, и таким образом принесет радость и счастье. Он ждет и надеется только на Вас!
texts.en:
Kahramon is a hardworking and respectable man. He is married and has young children. His family's living conditions are very difficult. 

Kahramon began working in the fields at a very young age. Like all the other village residents, he also herded cattle. As an adult, he got married and again worked in animal husbandry and crop farming. He mainly grows wheat, corn, and other agricultural products. He has been doing this for more than 15 years now. His wife and sons help him run the business. Kahramon sells his harvest directly to local residents for lower prices than they can find at the bazaar. He refines wheat himself with a mill and he uses the flour to bake bread. He feeds the leftover refined wheat to his cattle. 

Kahramon wants to improve the well-being of his family. In order to do this, he needs to purchase some electronics and new furniture, especially because the latter is old and falling apart. However, he does not earn enough to afford the new furniture. So, he is requesting a loan of 2000 som to purchase it. The furniture will make his home more cozy, bringing his family joy and happiness. He is placing his hopes on you!

loans.use: To buy furniture for his house

loans.name: Sadirbek

texts.ru: Садирбеку 26 лет. Он очень трудолюбивый и целеустремлённый мужчина, он женат и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Его дети не совершеннолетние. Условия жизни у них были очень тяжелые. С целью улучшения условия проживания 5 лет назад он начал свой бизнес скотоводством. Его заботливая жена помогает ему в ведении бизнеса. Год за годом он изучает все аспекты бизнеса и усовершенствует свои знания. С полученного дохода он старается улучшить условия проживания, но его доход не хватает для покупки мебели и других современных технологий. Его дети растут и требуют больше благ. Он должен установить комнату для его младшего сына, а для этого нужно купить мебель. С целью покупки мебели он обращается в ИМОН Интернешнл и обещает погасить займ во время. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 2500 сомони для покупки мебели. Садирбек и его маленький сын ждут вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Sadirbek is a 26-year-old married man with two young children. He is very hardworking and motivated, but his family's living conditions have been very difficult. 

Aiming to improve his family's living conditions, Sadirbek began his own animal husbandry business five years ago. His caring wife helps him run the business. Year after year he continues to learn new aspects of business and to perfect his knowledge. 

Sadirbek tries to use his earnings to improve his family's living conditions, but these earnings are not enough to purchase new furniture and certain modern electronics. His children are growing up and beginning to require more financial resources. For example, he should set up a room for his youngest son, but he needs furniture to do that. Hence, he turned to IMON International for a loan to purchase furniture. He promises to repay his loan on time. He is requesting 2500 som to purchase the furniture. Sadirbek and his young son are waiting on your kindness!

loans.use: To buy furniture for his son’s room

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Lucresia

texts.en: Lucresia is 62 years old and married with six children. She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Lucresia is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. She has been raising pigs for three years and also earns additional income from raising ducks. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more ready-to-wear clothes to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to maintain her motorcycle

loans.name: Akram

texts.ru: Акрам в нашей организации кредитуется второй цикл. Он добросовестный, целеустремлённый и трудолюбивый мужчина. Он родился в сельской местности, который имеет хорошее условие для животноводства и выращивания сельскохозяйственных культур. В основном он выращивает пшеницу, ячмень. Несколько лет назад Акрам получил кредит из нашей организации и начал свой бизнес скотоводством и получил хороший доход от данного бизнеса. В ведении данного бизнеса ему помогала жена. Потом Акрам на определённое время уехал в Россию, а его жена Машхура продолжала его бизнес, то есть сама посеяла пшеницу и ячмень параллельно откармливала скот. Так как Акрам в России не имел постоянную работу, он вернулся на Родину и начал продолжать свой бизнес. Акрам на полученный урожай покупает скот из базара на низкие цены, его жена на определённое время откармливает скот и перепродают по высокой цене. На полученный доход от бизнеса Акрам улучшил условию своего домохозяйства. В этом году Акрам посеял на 2 гектара земли ячменя, однако из-за неблагополучной погоды Акрам не мог получить намеченный урожай. Поэтому он обращался в нашу организацию с целью получения займа для покупки авиабилета  и хочет уехать в Россию, а его жена продолжает его бизнес.  Акрам надеется на Вашу благотворительность.
texts.en:
Akram is a conscientious, motivated, and hardworking man. He was born in a village that has good farming conditions. He mainly grows wheat and barley. 

This is Akram's second time getting a loan from our organization. A few years ago he took a loan from our organization to start his own animal husbandry business. His wife helped with the business and they made a good profit. 

Then, for a period of time, Akram went to Russia and his wife, Mashkhura, continued to run his business. She planted all the wheat and barley while also feeding the cattle. Akram did not find permanent work in Russia and, so, he returned to his homeland to work on his business. 

At harvest time, Akram purchases cattle at the bazaar for low prices. Then, his wife feeds the cattle for a period of time before reselling them for higher prices. The profits from Akram's business enabled him to improve his farm. 

This year Akram planted two hectares of barley, but due to bad weather, Akram did not have the kind of harvest he was expecting. Hence, he turned to our organization for a loan to purchase a plane ticket to Russia. His wife will stay behind and run the business. Akram is hoping for your charity!

loans.use: To buy a plane ticket to Russia to find a job

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Adrien

texts.fr: Adrien est âgé de 37 ans et vit au Bénin. Adrien n’a pas du tout fréquenté l'école. Adrien est marié à une marchande du nom de Elisabeth. Le couple a huit enfants, dont certains sont scolarisés. En plus de ces enfants le couple a quatre autres enfants à leur charge. Afin d’assurer les diverses charges de la famille, Adrien mène comme activité l’agriculture depuis une vingtaine d'année. Adrien s'approvisionne en intrants dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but d'augmenter sa culture en vue de mieux répondre aux exigences de sa clientèle, Adrien sollicite pour la sixième fois, un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les premiers prêts ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Adrien is 37 years old and lives in Benin. Adrien did not go to school. He is married to a trader called Elisabeth. The couple have 8 children, some of whom go to school. As well as their own children, the couple are responsible for 4 more.

Adrien has been a farmer for around 20 years, in order to be able to take care of his family. He gets his agricultural inputs at a market in Benin. Adrien is requesting a loan for the 6th time from ALIDé, with a view to increasing his production in order to better respond to the demands of his clientèle. The first loans have been properly repaid.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs with which to grow peppers, black-eyed peas and corn.

loans.name: Farijika Group

texts.fr: La cliente Furaha, conseillère du groupe d’affaire «Farijika », est entrepreneur, âgée de 38 ans, mariée, mère de 10 jeunes enfants, qui étudient tous. Son mari est un évangéliste pasteur. Elle est vendeuse de divers (Fanta, souliers, savons, sucre, etc.). Il y a 12 ans révolus qu’elle exerce ces petites activités. Cependant, elle vient d’obtenir son 13eme crédit auprès de l’IMF Hekima. Ce nouveau prêt  doit lui servir de s’approvisionner avec 2 casiers de Fanta, 25 kg de sucres, etc. En plus, elle souhaite voir ses enfants grandir, accroitre son entreprise, acheter et construire une maison. La cliente remercie Hekima pour ses actions en faveur de pauvres femmes exclues de banque classique.
texts.en:
Furaha, advisor to the business group "Farijika", is a 38-year-old entrepreneur who is married and the mother of 10 children, who all go to school. Her husband is an evangelical pastor. She sells various items (Fanta, shoes, soaps, sugar, etc.) and has been doing this work for 12 years. She has just received her 13th loan from MFI Hekima. This new loan will be used to buy 2 cases of Fanta, 25 kgs of sugar, etc. She also would like to see her children grow up, increase her business, and to buy and build a house.

The customer thanks Hekima for its actions in aid of poor women excluded from regular banks.

loans.use: to buy 2 cases of Fanta, 25 kgs of sugar, etc.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Sakhan

texts.en: Sakhan is 58 years old. She is married and lives with her husband in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker. Her husband (who joins her in the picture) is a tuk tuk taxi driver who earns about $10 daily. Because the present tuk tuk trailer is old, Sakhan is requesting a loan of $500 to purchase a new trailer for her husband. In the future, she would like to run an additional business and build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase a new trailer for her husband's tuk tuk business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more cell phone load from GLOBE and SMART to resell

loans.name: Savy

texts.en: Savy is 42 years old. She is married and resides with three children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been selling fried noodles and fried rice for more than ten years, earning approximately $20 daily. Her husband (who joins her in the picture) is a soldier. He earns about $4 each day. In order to improve her family’s finances, Savy is requesting a loan of $700 to purchase groceries to sell. By doing so, she will generate more income for the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children attend university. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase groceries to sell.

loans.name: Len

texts.en:
Len. a 56-year-old married woman residing with her husband and five children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia, has been involved in growing rice and breeding pigs for more than 10 years, earning approximately $4 daily. Her husband (shown with her in the picture) helps her run the business. Two of her children are employed, earning about $9 per day.

In order to improve her family’s finances, Len is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase cattle to breed in order to sell calves. In the future, she would like to establish a small poultry farm and help her children earn a bachelor’s degree. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase cattle to breed.

loans.name: Elisabeth

texts.fr: Agée de 45ans, Elisabeth est mariée et mère de deux enfants qui sont déjà à leur propre charge. Les deux enfants ont respectivement 28ans et 25ans. Elle vend des sacs de charbons depuis quelques années et s'approvisionne auprès des grossistes au Bénin. Dans le but d'accroître sa capacité d'approvisionnement et de couvrir les exigences de ses clients, Elisabeth a sollicité et a obtenu un financement auprès de Finadev en vue de maximiser son revenu additionnel et d'élargir son activité.
texts.en: 45-year-old Elisabeth is married and the mother of 2 children who are already independent. The children are 28 and 25 years old, respectively. She has been selling bags of charcoal for several years and gets her supplies from wholesalers in Benin. Elisabeth has requested and received a loan from Finadev in order to build her supply capacity and cover the demands of her customers, with a view to maximising her additional income and expanding her business.

loans.use: to buy 25 bags of charcoal.

loans.name: Théophile

texts.fr: Théophile est âgé de 40 ans et vit au Bénin. Théophile est marié à une marchande du nom de Cécile. Théophile a un peu fréquenté l'école. Le couple a cinq enfants dont certains sont scolarisés et tous à leur charge. Théophile vit ensemble avec sa femme et ses enfants et assure ensemble les charges de la maison. Afin d’assurer les diverses charges de la famille, Théophile mène comme activité depuis seize ans, l’agriculture. Dans la quête d'augmenter sa production Théophile désire acheter des intrants pour cultiver du niébé, du maïs et du piment dans le but de mieux répondre au exigence de ses clients. C'est pour la cinquième fois que Théophile sollicite un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Théophile is 40 years old and lives in Benin. He is married to a trader called Cécile. Théophile has had a bit of schooling. The couple have 5 dependent children, some of whom go to school. Théophile lives together with wife and children, and together they take care of the household responsibilities.

Théophile has been a farmer for 16 years, in order to be able to cover the different family expenses. In order to increase his production, so that he can better respond to his customer demand, Théophile would like to buy agricultural inputs needed to cultivate black-eyed peas, corn and peppers. This is the 5th time that he request a loan from ALIDé. The previous loans have been correctly repaid.

loans.use: to cultivate black-eyed peas, corn and peppers.

loans.name: Sophea

texts.en:
Sophea, 31-year-old mother of two, is married to a fisherman and resides in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been selling fish for more than six years, earning approximately $30 daily.

In order to improve her family’s finances, Sophea is requesting a loan of $1500 to purchase groceries to sell. By doing so, she will generate extra income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn a bachelor’s degree.

loans.use: to purchase groceries to sell.

loans.name: Cheng Ky

texts.en:
Cheng Ky, a 46-year-old mother of five, resides with her family in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia, where she is married to a fisherman. Cheng Ky has been selling fish for more than a year, earning approximately $13 daily. One of her children is a garment worker who earns about $3 each day.

In order to develop her family’s economy, Cheng Ky is requesting a loan of $1500 to purchase land to use for farming. This purchase will help her generate additional income for the family. In the future, Cheng Ky would like to expand her business and help her children earn a bachelor’s degree. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase farmland.

loans.name: Antonia

texts.en:
Antonia is a 45 year old married woman from Talibon, Bohol. 

She and her husband have been engaged in a fishing business for several years now. This is the source of their income.

Antonia is asking for a loan to buy new fishing nets, lead weights, hooks and buckets for storage. Through this, her husband will be able to enhance his daily catch thus giving them more fish to sell in the market.

She hopes to expand their business in the future.

loans.use: to buy new fishing nets, lead weights, hooks and buckets for storage.

loans.name: Luz

texts.en:
Luz is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buying and selling rice business in the Philippines. Luz has been in this business for 34 years, and she earns additional income from farming rice.

She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of rice grains to sell for her business.

Luz has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of rice grains to sell.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
This is Cecilia, 40, a resident of Intramuros, Manila, Philippines. She is married to Tito, a carpenter and is a mother to her children. She, together with her husband, manages their household as they operate the business. At this time she is working hard to sustain their family’s everyday expenses.

Cecilia has a VMobile extreme load card. Instead of using a phone to transfer phone time to customers, she uses the card, which can accommodate all networks. It can also be used in surfing the Internet. She also sells accessories for cell phones. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. Her monthly income from sales is PHP 10,500.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 8,000 loan. She will be using the loan to buy extreme load cards and cell phone accessories like batteries, housings and chargers. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.  

Cecilia dreams to take her family out of poverty. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for more extreme load cards and cell phone accessories like batteries, housings and chargers.

loans.name: Sarapia

texts.en:
Sarapia is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business buying and selling vegetables and spices in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing 25000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional vegetables to sell.

Sarapia has been in this business for 10 years. 

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more used clothes to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy animal feed for her pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages for her store.

loans.name: Pascaline's Group

texts.fr: Il s'agit d'un groupe composé de deux femmes en caution solidaire. Agée de 40ans, Pascaline la responsable est célibataire sans enfant. Elle a une poissonnerie où elle vend aussi des boîtes de conserve, de spaguetti et d'autres articles depuis quelques années. Elle s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés du Bénin. En vue d'accroître son chiffre d'affaire et de satisfaire la demande de ses clients, elle a sollicité et a obtenu un micro crédit à Finadev. Ce crédit lui permettra de maximiser son bénéfice et de subvenir à ses besoins. Pascaline se retrouve à gauche dans la photo.
texts.en: This group is made up of 2 women who are joint guarantors. 40-year-old Pascaline is the group leader and is single, with no children. She has a fishmonger's where she has also been selling canned goods, spaghetti and other items for several years. She gets her supplies at a market in Benin. She has requested and received a loan from Finadev with a view to increasing her sales and satisfying her customer demand. This loan will enable her to maximise her profits and meet her needs. Pascaline is on the left in the photo.

loans.use: to buy 2 boxes of fish, 2 boxes of tomatoes and 10 boxes of spaghetti.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fifteen pagnes, ten coolers and fifteen '555' brand bowls

loans.name: Yémalin's Group

texts.fr: Il s'agit d'un groupe composé de deux membres en caution solidaire. Agée de 57ans, Yémalin la responsable est mariée et mère de 07 enfants qui sont déjà à leur propre charge. Le plus âgé et le moins âgé ont respectivement 30ans et 23ans . Elle vend des beignets frits depuis quelques années et s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés du Bénin. En vue d'accroître sa capacité d'approvisionnement et de satisfaire la demande de ses clients, Yémalin a sollicité et a obtenu un financement auprès de Finadev. Ce financement lui permettra de maximiser son profit et de subvenir à ses propres besoins. Yémalin se retrouve à gauche dans la photo.
texts.en:
This group consists of two members in joint liability. Yémalin, age 57, is the group’s representative. She is a married mother of seven independent children aged 23 to 30. She has been selling fritters for a few years, and she buys her stock at a market in Benin. 

To bolster her working capital and meet customer demand, Yémalin obtained a loan from Finadev. This credit will help her to maximize her profits and support herself. 

Yémalin is on the left in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a bag of yams, a bag of wheat and five liters of oil to make fritters for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy 22 pagnes, 12 pairs of shoes, 10 bags and 3 boxes of perfume

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy 18 pallets of drinks, 12 pallets of mineral water and 2 boxes of milk

loans.name: Estelle

texts.fr: Estelle est âgée de 42 ans et vit au Bénin. Estelle n’a pas fréquenté l'école. Estelle est mariée à Vincent, un cultivateur. Le couple à six enfants, dont certains sont scolarisés et tous à leur charge. Estelle vit avec son mari et ses enfants. le couple assure ensemble les divers besoins de la famille. Afin d’assurer ses diverses charges, Estelle mène comme activité, l’agriculture et vend parallèlement divers produits dans un marché du Bénin depuis quinze ans. Estelle désire s’approvisionner en intrants pour cultiver du maïs, du piment et de la tomate en vue de satisfaire les besoins de ces clients. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour augmenter sa culture, Estelle sollicite pour la cinquième fois, un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Ce prêt lui permettra certainement de rehausser le niveau de son activité et de se faire plus de profits. Les premiers prêts ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: Estelle is 42 years old and lives in Benin.  She did not attend school.  She is married to Vincent, who is a farmer, and the couple have six children.  Some of their children are attending school and they are all dependent on their parents.  Estelle lives with her husband and children.  The couple jointly take care of their family's needs.  In order to provide for her family, Estelle farms and sells a range of products in one of Benin's markets.  She has been doing this for 15 years.  Estelle would like to stock up with farm supplies so that she can grow corn, peppers and tomatoes and thereby satisfy her customers' needs.  In order to please her customers and increase the amount of crops she grows, Estelle is requesting her fifth loan from ALIDé.  This loan will allow her to increase her business activity and make more profits.  Her previous loans were repaid correctly.

loans.use: to buy supplies for growing corn, peppers and tomatoes

loans.name: Jérémie

texts.fr: Jérémie est âgé de 47 ans et est marié à Jacqueline, une marchande. Le couple a douze enfants, dont certains  scolarisés et tous à leur charge. En plus de leurs enfants, le couple a trois autres enfants à charge. Jérémie et sa femme vivent dans la même maison avec leurs enfants. Jérémie n’a pas fréquenté l'école. Parallèlement à son métier d’agriculteur, Jérémie fait l’élevage des bœufs depuis une dizaine d’années environs. Dans le but d'augmenter sa production et de répondre aux exigence de ces clients Jérémie veut acheter des intrants pour cultiver du piment, du niébé et du gombo. Jérémie s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. C'est pour la sixième fois que Jérémie sollicite auprès de ALIDé un crédit. Les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: Jérémie is 47 years old and married to Jacqueline, who is a trader.  The couple have 12 children.  Some of their children are in school and all of them are still dependent on their parents.  Jérémie and his wife live in the same house together with their children.  Jérémie never attended school.  In parallel with his work as a crop farmer, Jérémie has also been cattle farming for around ten years.  With the aim of increasing his production and meeting his customers' needs, Jérémie would like to buy some farm supplies for growing peppers, black-eyed peas and okra.  He stocks up in a market in Benin.  This is the sixth time that he has requested a loan from ALIDé.  All of his previous loans were repaid on time.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies for growing peppers, black-eyed peas and okra

loans.name: Mary

texts.es:
Mary, de 33 años, es una mujer amable y muy trabajadora, está soltera y no tiene hijos, vive en su casa propia junto a sus padres y hermanos, todos comparten la lucha por encontrar el camino al éxito.
El trabajo de Mary consiste en la compra y venta de madera, desde muy temprano sale de su casa a los diferentes aserraderos de la ciudad en donde busca los mejores trozos de madera para comprarlos y luego llevarlos a realizar el proceso de acabado. El resultado que obtiene son tablas, listones y otros, toda esta actividad lo realiza con su ayudante, el producto terminado es enviado a sus clientes ubicados en diversas ciudades del país, lleva ya 10 años con este trabajo y esta muy contenta por que le permite tener ganancias satisfactorias para la economía de su hogar. Al principio era muy complicado para ella realizar este trabajo ya que es muy fatigante porque en ocasiones es necesario hacer uso de cierta fuerza, sin embargo con el tiempo fue acostumbrándose y ahora trabaja sin ninguna dificultad y a un buen ritmo. Este es el crédito número 10 con MFP, está muy contento por el apoyo financiero que le están brindando ya que así se sentirá seguro de avanzar con su trabajo, por otro lado se compromete a continuar pagando puntualmente sus cuotas tal como le programen, está muy feliz de pertenecer a su banco comunal ya que todos son muy responsables y solidarios. Con el monto solicitado 2000 soles, comprará madera para aserrarlas y posteriormente las enviará a diversos ciudades del Perú.
texts.en:
Mary, age 33, is a friendly and hardworking woman. She is single and has no children. Mary lives in her own home with her parents and siblings. All of them share in their struggle to find a successful path in life.

Mary’s work consists of buying and selling wood. She leaves her home early in the morning so that she can travel to different sawmills in the city in search of the best chunks of wood. Mary buys these chunks of wood and then has them delivered to her business to undergo a finishing process. The end results consist of planks, boards, and other lumber pieces. She does all of her work with the help of an assistant. These finished products are sent to her customers in different cities of the country. Mary has been in this line of work for 10 years and is very pleased that she is able to earn a decent household income. At first, things were very complicated because this type of work is tiring and requires a certain amount of strength. Over time, she became accustomed to the work and is now able to work at a good pace without any difficulty.

This is her 10th loan with MFP. Mary is very pleased with the financial support that has been provided, which makes her feel confident about advancing her business. In addition, she promises to continue submitting her loan payments promptly and on schedule. Mary is happy to be part of her Communal Bank since all of the members are responsible and supportive. The loan amount of 2,000 PEN will be used to buy wood from the sawmills so that she can ship her products to various cities in Peru.

loans.use: to buy wood from the sawmills.

loans.name: Lyuda

texts.en:
Lyuda is 55 years old and lives in Vanadzor city, Armenia. She is divorced and has a son and daughter whom Lyuda has brought up alone, without her former husband’s support. Her children are married and they also have their own families: Lyuda’s son works and lives with his wife and son in Turkey, and Lyuda’s daughter lives with her husband, little baby and Lyuda. 

After graduating from school, Lyuda worked in different positions and found trading to be more profitable than any other jobs. She has run her own clothing business for more than 15 years now. Today, Lyuda rents a stall in Vanadzor’s trading center and resells women’s sport clothes, which she imports from Yerevan wholesale markets. Her son also helps her in their family business and once a month sends a new clothing collection from Turkey for reselling. 

Lyuda has said that doing this type of work is too hard for a woman, but she has always been able to overcome any challenges in her life by herself. At the same time, she is very pleased and appreciates her life. She needs a $1,500 US dollar loan to buy a new sports clothes assortment for her business.

loans.use: To buy new sport clothes for her clothing stall

loans.name: Som Ath

texts.en:
Som Ath is 31 years old. She is married and resides with three children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. 

She and her husband have been working in a garment factory for more than three years, earning approximately $6 daily. 

Due to lack of funds, Som Ath is requesting a loan of $500 to purchase timber and zinc to use for fixing her house. This money will help her obtain a comfortable house and provide better living condition for her family. 

In the future, she would like to run a sewing shop and help her children earn bachelor’s degree.

loans.use: to purchase timber and zinc to use for fixing her house.

loans.name: Chanthy

texts.en:
Chanthy is 47 years old. She is married and resides with four children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. 

She has been selling snails for more than a year, earning approximately $3 daily. Her husband runs a business of purchasing cattle to resell. He makes an income of $5 per day. 

In order to improve her family’s finances, Chanthy requests a loan of $1,200 to purchase more cattle to resell. By doing so, they would earn more income for the family. 

In the future, she would like to expand the business and help her children earn higher educations. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase more cattle to resell

loans.name: Bayanmunkh

texts.en:
Bayanmunkh, 39 years old, lives with his wife in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. 

He transports people between Ulaanbaatar and Darkhan, the second largest city in Mongolia. His wife runs her own private business, but their main income comes from his automobile, which has a diesel engine. 

As a person who worries about the environment, Bayanmunkh wants to change his automobile with another one that has a gas engine, since gas engine-powered automobiles emit less smoke and contribute less air pollution. 

So he is requesting a 6,800,000 MNT loan to buy an environmentally friendlier car. The result is beneficial to both sides: This family will generate more income for their children and the air will be polluted less.

loans.use: to buy a more environmentally friendly car.

loans.name: Sahaya

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Sahaya works hard to support her family.

She has a buying and selling dried coconut meat business in the Philippines, and she earns additional income from food vending and running a general store. 

Sahaya is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to purchase more dried coconut meat to sell for her business.

Sahaya has been sustaining her business activities through her past 22 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more dried coconut meat to sell.

loans.name: Chan

texts.en:
Chan is 31 years old. He is single and lives with his brother and sister in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. 

He has been working as a mechanic for more than five years, earning approximately $5 daily. His sister and brother are employed. They make an income of $8 per day. 

In order to improve his family’s finances, Chan is requesting a loan of $1,500 to purchase fish and firewood to use for producing smoked fish to sell. By doing so, he would generate more income for the family. In the future, he would like to run a generator spare parts shop.

loans.use: to purchase fish and firewood for producing smoked fish to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for making fried chicken.

loans.name: Petra

texts.en:
This is Petra, 44, a resident of Intramuros, Manila, Philippines. She is married to Canaito, a taxi driver and a mother to her children. Together with her husband,she manages their household while operating her business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Petra operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is basically a small convenience store that retails groceries, toiletries and beverages piecemeal to the local neighborhood. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a mall amount of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of 500 PHP in sales every day.

To help her continue business operations, she is requesting a 14,000 PHP loan. She will use the loan to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. 

Petra hopes to expand her business and dreams of giving her children a high-quality education through all her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to buy grocery items, toiletries and beverages for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Channy

texts.en: Channy is 40 years old. She is married and resides with three children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been making baskets to sell for more than ten years, earning approximately $2 daily. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about $3 per day. Two of her children are employed in a garment factory. They make an income of $6 each day. Due to lack of funds, Channy is requesting a loan of $1500 to purchase construction materials to finish her house. This money will help her provide better living conditions for her family. In the future, she would like to run a fertilizer shop and help her youngest child attend university.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to finish her house.

loans.name: Saran

texts.en: Saran is 34 years old. She is widowed and resides with three children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been running a tailoring shop for more than two years, earning approximately $4 daily. In order to improve her family’s finances, Saran is requesting a loan of $400 to purchase rice to store and resell when the price is higher. By doing so, she will earn more income for the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children attend university. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her house to make it more comfortable for the family.

loans.use: to purchase rice to store and resell when the price is higher.

loans.name: Gilda

texts.en:
Gilda is married with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Gilda is 56 years old and has one child who is currently in school.

Gilda has a restaurant business in the Philippines. She requested a 30000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients for her restaurant business.

Gilda has been in this business for 20 years. In the future, Gilda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional ingredients for her restaurant business.

loans.name: Khon

texts.en: Khon is 64 years old. She is married and resides with one child in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in growing rice and fattening up animals for more than ten years, earning approximately $4 daily. Her husband is a construction foreman who earns about $5 each day. Khon is requesting a loan of $800 to purchase rice seeds and fertilizer to use for farming. In the future, she would like to expand her farming business and rebuild her present house to make it more comfortable for her family.

loans.use: to purchase rice seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Rufina

texts.en:
This is Rufina, 43, a resident of Intramuros, Manila, Philippines. She is married to Jhonee and a mother to her six children. Together with her husband,she manages their own household while operating her business. At this time, she is working hard to provide income for their everyday expenses.

Rufina sells fruits and garlic in the community market. She buys a quantity of fruits and garlic and sells it by the kilo. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of 500 PHP in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a 16,000 PHP loan. She will use the loan to buy more garlic, grapes, apples and oranges for her business. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.  

Rufina dreams of giving her children a high quality education and hopes to have a good life. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God he studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to buy more garlic, grapes, apples and oranges for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more products from AVON to resell.

loans.name: Matilde

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 3 filhos, 1 já frequenta Escola, vive na casa própria e não sustenta mais ninguém para além de seus filhos.
Tem um negócio de venda de produtos alimentares diversos. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (feijão, amendoim, arroz, óleo e outros) para aumentar e diversificar a sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja construir um armazém de venda de produtos e erguer uma nova casa no outro bairro para ajudar na subida de receita mensal, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é redobrar o esforço e conseguir novos empréstimos para poder conseguir alcançar seus projectos.
texts.en:
Matilde is married and has three children, one of whom already goes to school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and doesn't support anyone else other than her children.
She owns a business selling various foodstuffs. With the current loan she intends to purchase goods (beans, peanuts, rice, cooking oil, etc.) in order to stock up and diversify her merchandise.
In the future she hopes to build a grocery store for selling her products. She also hopes to build a new house in a different neighborhood and increase her monthly income. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is working twice as hard and getting new loans so that she can fulfill her projects.

loans.use: to purchase goods (beans, peanuts, rice, cooking oil, etc.) for selling so that she can stock up and diversify her merchandise.

loans.name: Rubens

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 8 filhos, 5 dos quais são da última relação e frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria e não sustenta mais ninguém para além de seus filhos.
Trabalha como guarda numa empresa privada e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (aros, janelas, cimento, areia, pedra, porta, e outros) para dar continuidade com a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja iniciar a criação de frangos de corte e garantir um estabelecimento comercial, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é conseguir manter se saudável para não ter algo que possa desviar os seus projectos.
texts.en:
Rubens is married and has eight children, five of whom are from are from his current relationship and attend school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and doesn't support anyone else other than his children.
He works as a security guard for a private company. With the current loan he intends to purchase construction supplies (window frames, windows, cement, sand, rocks, doors, etc.) in order to continue building his house.
In the future he wishes to start a business raising broiler chickens and to establish a store. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is keeping himself healthy so that nothing can get in the way of his projects.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (window frames, windows, cement, sand, rocks, doors, etc.) in order to continue building his house.

loans.name: Virginie

texts.fr: Virginie est âgée de 36 ans et vit au Bénin. Virginie n’a pas fréquenté l'école. Virginie est mariée à Bertin, un cultivateur. Le couple à trois enfants, dont certains sont scolarisés et tous à leur charge. Virginie vit avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les divers besoins de la famille. Afin d’assurer ses diverses charges, Virginie mène comme activité, l’agriculture et vend parallèlement de l’akassa (aliment local préparé à base d'amidon de maïs) dans une région du Bénin depuis près de vingt ans. Dans le but d'augmenter sa culture, Virginie désire acheter des intrants pour cultiver le maïs, le niébé et le piment en vue de mieux satisfaire les besoins de ces clients. Ce troisième prêt lui permettra certainement de rehausser le niveau de son activité et de se faire plus de profits. Les premiers prêts ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Virginie is 36 years old and lives in Benin. She did not go to school. She is married to Bertin, a farmer. The couple have 3 dependent children, some fo whom attend school. Virginie lives with her husband and children. The couple both take care of the family's various needs. In order to be able to meet her various responsibilities, Virginie has been farming and selling akassa (a local meal prepared with corn-starch) in an area of Benin for almost 20 years.

In order to increase her production, Virginie would like to buy the agricultural inputs needed to cultivate corn, black-eyed peas and peppers, with a view to better satisfying her customer's needs. This third loan will enable her to increase her level of business activity and to make more profits. The first loans have been correctly repaid.

loans.use: to cultivate corn, black-eyed peas and peppers.

loans.name: Cécile

texts.fr: Cécile est âgée de 42 ans et vit au Bénin. Cécile est mariée à un cultivateur du nom de Théophile. Cécile n’a pas fréquenté l'école. Le couple a quatre enfants, dont certains sont scolarisés et tous à leur charge. Cécile vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les charges de la maison. Afin d’assurer les diverses charges de la famille, Cécile mène comme activité depuis dix ans, l’agriculture. Dans la quête d'augmenter sa culture et en vue de satisfaire sa clientèle, Cécile veut acheter des intrants dans un marché du Bénin pour cultiver du niébé, du maïs et du gombo. Cécile sollicite pour la troisième fois, un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les premiers prêts ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Cécile is 42 years old and lives in Benin. She is married to a farmer called Théophile. Cécile did not go to school. The couple have 4 dependent children, some of whom attend school. Cécile lives together with her husband and children. The couple both take care of the household's expenses. Cécile has been farming for 10 years, so that she can cover the family's various expenses.

In order to increase her production, and with a view to better satisfying her customer's needs, Cécile would like to buy the agricultural inputs needed to cultivate black-eyed peas, corn and okra, at a market in Benin. This is the third loan that she is requesting from ALIDé. The previous loans have been properly repaid.

loans.use: to cultivate black-eyed peas, corn and okra.

loans.name: Félix

texts.fr: Félix, âgé de 47 ans et est marié à Antoinette. Le couple a dix enfants, dont certains scolarisés. En plus de leurs enfants, le couple à un autre enfant à leur charge. La famille vit ensemble. Félix assure ensemble avec sa femme les diverses charges familiales. Félix n’a pas fréquenté l'école. Pour subvenir à ses différents besoins, Félix exerce l'agriculture et fait parallèlement l'élevage des porcs depuis une trentaine d’années. Félix s’approvisionne dans une région du Bénin. En vue de renforcer davantage son activité afin de mieux satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle, Félix désire acheter des intrants pour cultiver du maïs, du niébé et du piment. C'est la sixième fois Félix  sollicite l'appui financier de ALIDé. Les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Félix, age 47, is married to Antoinette. The couple have ten children, some of whom go to school. In addition to their children, they have another child in their care. The family all live together, and Félix and his wife handle the various household responsibilities. 

Félix did not attend school. He makes a living as a farmer and he has also been raising pigs for about 30 years. He buys his supplies in a region of Benin. 

To bolster his activity and better meet customer demand, Félix wishes to buy inputs to grow maize, niébé (black-eyed peas) and peppers. 

This is Félix’s sixth loan cycle with ALIDé. All past loans were repaid without incident

loans.use: to buy inputs to grow maize, niébé and peppers.

loans.name: Blanca

texts.es:
Blanca es soltera, tiene dos hijos los cuales asisten al colegio, viven en alquiler ocupando dos habitaciones con paredes de acabado fino y el piso de cemento, la casa esta ubicada en la zona de Miraflores de la ciudad de La Paz.

Blanca trabaja como empleada en una empresa de venta de electrodomésticos diez horas al día con lo poco que gana debe cubrir los gastos de alimentación y pago de servicios básicos de su familia, ya que el padre de sus hijos nunca estuvo presente para ellos.

El crédito requiere para pagar la continuación de su tratamiento médico post operatorio ya que debe mantenerse con buena salud para poder cuidar de sus hijos.

El sueño de Blanca es poder ahorrar y comprarse una casa propia.

Es la tercera vez que solicita préstamo de Kiva.
texts.en:
Blanca is single and has two children who are in school. She lives in a rented home that includes two rooms with finished walls and cement floors. The house is located in the District of Miraflores in the city of La Paz.

Blanca is employed by a company that sells household appliances. She works 10 hours a day and uses what little she earns to cover expenses, such as food and basic services for her family. The father of her children has never been present for them.

The loan she is requesting will be used to pay for continued post-operative medical treatment. She needs to stay in good health so that she can care for her children. Blanca’s dream is to save money and buy a house of her own.

This is the third time she has requested a Kiva loan.

loans.use: to pay for continued post-operative treatment.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buying and selling used clothing business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for five years. Ruth earns additional income from pig fattening and farming coconut.

She is borrowing PHP 29,000 through NWTF to purchase additional bundles of used cloth to sell for her business.

Ruth has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional bundles of used clothing to sell.

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda is married with eight children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Imelda is 45 years old and has 4 children who are in school.

Imelda has a business selling used clothes in the Philippines. Imelda requested a 29500 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional used clothes to sell.

Imelda has been in this business for 7 years. In the future, Imelda would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional used clothes to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy animal feed for the pigs she sells.

loans.name: Edelyn

texts.en:
This is Edelyn, 36, a resident of Intramuros, Manila, Philippines. She is married to Francisco, a laborer. She is also a mother to her children. With her husband, she manages their household while operating her business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Edelyn is a fish vendor. She buys different kinds of fish at wholesale prices and sells them by the kilo. She buys fish at the local fish port early in the morning. There are many patrons who prefer her products because they are assured of its freshness and cleanliness. Her store is located in a temporary fish market. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of 1,000 PHP in sales every day.

To help her continue operating her business, she is requesting a 20,000 PHP loan. She will utilize the loan to buy more fish to be sold every day. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.  

Edelyn dreams to be able to give all of her children a good and high-quality education. She hopes to have a good future through all her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay micro finance loans.

loans.use: To buy fish for resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw  materials used in making candles

loans.name: Chan Nary

texts.en:
Chan Nary is 32 years old. She is married and resides with two children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been selling clothes for more than three years, earning approximately $45 daily. Her husband helps her run the business. 

In order to improve her family’s finances, Chan Nary requests a loan of $1500 to purchase more clothes to sell. This money will help her obtain more fashionable clothes  to sell in her shop. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn higher education degrees.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes to sell

loans.name: Tha

texts.en:
Tha is 33 years old. She is married and resides with her husband in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been working in a garment factory for more than five years, earning approximately $3 daily. Her husband is a motor taxi driver who makes an income of $5 per day. 

In order to improve her family’s finances, Tha requests a loan of $400 to purchase rice to resell for a profitable price. By doing so, she would earn more income for the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase rice to resell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more vegetables and spices to resell

loans.name: Phalley

texts.en:
Phalley is 33 years old. She is married and resides with two children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been working in a garment factory for more than five years, earning approximately $3 daily. Her husband is a motor taxi driver who makes an income of $10 per day. In addition, he is a fisherman.

 In order to develop her family’s finances, Phalley is requesting a loan of $1200 to purchase fishing equipment. In the future, she would like to run a tailoring shop and help her children earn higher education degrees.

loans.use: to purchase fishing equipment

loans.name: Dolores

texts.en:
Dolores is a hardworking, business-minded person. She is happily married to Jaime and blessed with four children. Two of her children are currently studying, while the other two are already working.

Dolores has been a good borrower for many cycles. Through her profits, she is able sustain her family's daily needs, improve her farming and hog-raising, and expand her variety store. She is really thankful to God and to the microfinance institution that helped her financially. This time, she plans to re-stock her variety store, but her capital is not sufficient due to farming and hog-raising expenses. Therefore, she is seeking a loan of 15,000 PHP. This loan will be use to buy soft drinks, biscuits, baked breads and some instant noodles. She hopes that through this loan she can further increase her income and be able to have a comfortable lifestyle someday.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, biscuits, baked breads and instant noodles for her variety store.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Ma. Fely

texts.en:
Ma. Fely is 62 years old and married with four children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 20000 PHP loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy additional items like noodles, canned goods, and snack foods to sell in her general store.

Ma. Fely has borrowed and paid 22 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 30 years and also earns an income from a restaurant. Ma. Fely aspires to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items like noodles, canned goods, and snack foods to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
Merlinda, 57, is married and has four children. 

Merlinda is in the agricultural business. She fattens pigs in the Philippines. Merlinda requested a 12000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Merlinda has been fattening pigs for 11 years now, and has borrowed 7 times in the past from NWTF to sustain this job.

In the future, Merlinda would like to repair and renovate her pig pens.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Huguette Nadine

texts.fr: Agée de 46ans, Nadine est mariée et mère de 04enfants scolarisés dont l'aîné est déjà à l'université. Le plus âgé et le moins âgé ont respectivement 23ans et 11ans. Elle a une boutique où elle vend des tissus, des savons et de divers depuis quelques années puis s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés du Bénin. Dans le souci de renforcer son fonds de roulement et de répondre favorablement la demande de ses clients, elle a fait recours au financement de Finadev en vue de maximiser son intérêt et de participer à la scolarisation ses enfants.
texts.en: Nadine is 46 years old, married and the mother of four children who attend school.  The oldest is 23 and the youngest is 11.  She has a shop where she has been selling fabric, soaps, and other various items for several years.   She gets her supplies at one of the markets in Benin.  In the hopes of increasing her working capital and to respond better to the demands of her customers, she has applied for financing from Finadev, in order to maximize her income and to contribute to the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy 35 lengths of fabric.

loans.name: Vasco

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 12 filhos, dos quais 4 ainda vão a Escola, vive na casa própria e não sustenta mais ninguém para além de seus filhos.
É pensionista militar já há bastante tempo e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, pedra, barrote, ferro e outros) para continuar com a ampliação da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja concluir a sua casa e oferecer melhor conforto a sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é conseguir terminar a ampliação da sua casa e oferecer melhor conforto a sua família.
texts.en:
Vasco is married and has 12 children, four of whom are still in school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and doesn't support anyone else other than his children.
He has been a military pensioner for a long time. With the current loan he intends to purchase construction supplies (cement, rocks, beams, iron, etc.) in order to continue enlarging his house.
In the future he wishes to finish the construction of his house and to provide his family with more comfort. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is finishing the enlargement of his house and providing his family with more comfort.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, rocks, beams, iron, etc.) in order to continue enlarging his house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, beams, iron, metal sheets, etc.) in order to continue building his house.

loans.name: Nicolas

texts.fr: Nicolas, est âgé de 40 ans et est marié à Véronica, une marchande. Le couple a sept enfants, dont certains scolarisés. En plus de ces enfants, le couple a un autre enfant à leur charge. Nicolas n’a pas fréquenté l'école. Nicolas vit ensemble avec ses enfants et sa femme. Le couple assure ensemble les différentes charges de la maison. Il y a de cela quinze ans que Nicolas exerce comme activité, l’agriculture et fait aussi parallèlement l’élevage des porcins. Nicolas exerce cette activité passionnément, ce qui lui permet de subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants. Nicolas s’approvisionne dans une région du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et en vue d’augmenter sa production Nicolas désire acheter des intrants pour cultiver du maïs, du piment et du gombo. C'est pour la sixième fois que Nicolas sollicite un crédit auprès de ALIDé, Ce crédit lui servira à mieux répondre aux demandes de sa clientèle et à se faire plus de profits. Les crédits précédents ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Nicolas is 40 years old and is married to Véronica, a trader. The couple have 7 children, some of whom attend school. As well as these children, the couple are also responsible for one more child. Nicolas did not go to school. He lives together with his children and wife. The couple take care of the various household responsibilities together.

Nicolas has been farming and breeding pigs for 15 years. He performs his work with passion, which enables him to meet his needs and those of his children. Nicolas gets his supplies in an area of Benin. In order to satisfy his customers and with a view to increasing his production, Nicolas would like to buy the agricultural inputs needed to cultivate corn, peppers and okra. This is the 6th time that Nicolas is requesting a loan from ALIDé. This loan will enable him to better respond to his customer demand and to make more profits. The previous loans have been correctly repaid.

loans.use: to cultivate corn, peppers and okra.

loans.name: Louis

texts.fr: Louis est âgé de 40 ans et est marié à Odile, une marchande. Le couple a six enfants, dont certains scolarisés. En plus de ces enfants, le couple à un autre enfant à leur charge. Louis n’a pas fréquenté l'école. Louis vit ensemble avec ses enfants et sa femme. Le couple assure ensemble les différentes charges de la maison. Il y a de cela vingt ans que Louis exerce comme activité, l’agriculture. Louis exerce cette activité passionnément, ce qui lui permet de subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants. Dans le but d'augmenter sa culture, Louis désire acheter des intrants pour cultiver du maïs, du niébé et du piment. Louis s’approvisionne dans une ville du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle, Louis sollicite un sixième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Ce crédit lui servira à mieux répondre à la demande de sa clientèle et à se faire plus de profits. Les crédits précédents ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Louis, age 40, is married to a merchant named Odile. The couple have six children, some of whom go to school. In addition to their children, they have another child in their care. The family all live together, and Louis and his wife handle the various household responsibilities. 

Louis did not attend school. He has been a farmer for 20 years. He is passionate about his activity, which allows him to support his family.  

To expand his activity, Louis wants to buy inputs to grow maize, niébé (black-eyed peas) and peppers. He buys his supplies in a city of Benin.

To achieve customer satisfaction, he is seeking a sixth loan from ALIDé. This credit will help him to meet customer demand and to bolster his profits. All past loans were repaid without incident.

loans.use: to buy inputs to grow maize, niébé and peppers.

loans.name: Silvia Eugenia

texts.es: La Sra. Silvia, cuenta que le fue bien con el anterior credito ya que utilizo para la compra de una conservadora, en esta ocacion solicita el credito para la compra d eproductos para surtir su tienda como abarrotes, dulces y refrescos, ya que por esta epoca de fin de año tiene mucha venta y quiere aprovechar para asi generar mas ingresos, la Sra. silvia es una persona muy responsable, es cliente antigua d ela institucion.
texts.en:
Sra. Silvia says that everything went well with her previous loan, which she used to buy a cooler. On this occasion, she is requesting a loan so that she can buy products to restock her store such as groceries, candy, and soft drinks. She generates many sales during the year-end season, so she wants to take advantage of this opportunity to earn more income.

Sra. Silvia is a very responsible individual and a long-time client of Emprender.

loans.use: to buy groceries, candy, and soft drinks.

loans.name: Celia

texts.es:
Celia  es soltera y tiene dos hijas que ya no dependen de ella, vive en la casa de su hermana compartiendo todas las dependencias, ella cuenta con un ambiente el cual es usado como dormitorio, sala, deposito y cocina,  la habitación es de adobe y el piso es de cemento, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona de La Portada de la ciudad de La Paz.
Actualmente Celia trabaja como comerciante de productos eléctricos y ropa vendiendo en uno de los sindicatos de choferes  a una gran mayoría de los chóferes.  Celia se encarga de sus gastos de transporte y alimentación. El crédito lo necesita para comprar chompas y deportivos para seguir vendiendo, pues sus clientes le han pedido más de estos artículos.
El sueño de Celia  es el de contar con una tienda de electrodomésticos y poder mejorar sus ingresos y poder contar con una persona que le ayude en las ventas.
Es la primera vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO Y KIVA.
texts.en:
Celia is single and has two daughters who are no longer dependent on her. She lives at her sister’s house and shares in all of the expenses. The house is made of adobe and has cement floors. It has space set aside for a bedroom, living area, storage closet, and kitchen. The house is located in the District of La Portada in the city of La Paz.

Celia currently works as a merchant, selling electrical goods and clothing near one of the transportation unions where there are a large number of drivers. She is responsible for expenses, such as transportation and food. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy sweaters and sportswear that she can continue selling. These items are the most requested by her customers.

Celia’s dream includes having a household appliance store, generating more income, and hiring an employee to help with making sales. This is the first time she has requested a loan from IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to buy sweaters and sportswear.
